subdisciplines.name: Industrial Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the material culture of industrial societies and the impact of industry on their communities.

subdisciplines.name: Colonial Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the material culture and social history of colonial societies.

subdisciplines.name: Post-Medieval Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the material culture and social history of societies after the Middle Ages.
